PROPERTY: Description: Barosma Betulina Leaf Oil is the volatile oil expressed from the leaves of Barosma betulina, Rutaceae
Allspice Oil. Pimenta Officinalis Fruit Oil is an essential oil obtained from the fruits of the All Spice, Pimenta officinalis, syn. P. dioica, Myrtaceae
Myrrh Oil; Heerabol. Commiphora Myrrha Gum Oil is an essential oil obtained from the gum-resin of the Myrrh, Commiphora myrrha, Burseraceae
Pinus Palustris Twig Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the twigs leaves of the Swamp Pine, Pinus palustris, Pinaceae
Juniperus Mexicana Wood Oil is an essential oil obtained from the wood of the Juniper, Juniperus mexicana, Cupressaceae. Syn Cedarwood Texas
Myrocaepus Frondosus Wood Oil is an essential oil obtained from the wood of the plant, Myrocarpus frondosus, Leguminosae. Syn. Cabreuva oil
Iris Pallida Root Oil is an essential oil obtained from the rhizomes of the plant of the Pale Flag, Iris pallida, Iridaceae
Pelargonium Crispum Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the plant, Pelargonium crispum, Geraniaceae
Styrax Benzoin Resin Oil ia an essential oil obtained from the balsamic resin of the Benzoin, Styrax benzoin, Styracaceae
Santalum Spicata Wood Oil is an essential oil obtained from the wood of the Australian Sandalwood, Santalum spicata, Santalaceae. It contains 75% santalols and 10% farnesol
Gum Benzoin Oil. Styrax Tonkinensis Resin Oil is a volatile oil obtained from the balsamic resin of the Tonkin Benzoin, Styrax tonkinensis, Styracaceae

Fennel Oil. Foeniculum Vulgare Capillaceum Fruit Oil is the volatile oil steam-distilled from the dried fruits of the Fennel, Foeniculum vulgare capillaceum, Umbelliferae. It contains anethole (50-60%), fenchone (about 10%), pinene, limonene and phellandrene

IDENTIFIER: name: CINNAMOMUM CAMPHORA FORMOSANA LEAF OIL RECTIFIED
PROPERTY: Description: Camphor Oil (Formosa or Japanese). Cinnamomum Camphora Formosana Leaf Oil Rectified is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the Camphor Tree, Cinnamomum tzumu Helms, syn. C. camphora (L.) var. formosana, Lauraceae. It contains > 90% linalool
Artemisia Herba-Alba Herb Oil is an essential oil obtained from the whole herbs of the plant, Artemisia herba-alba, Compositae
Rosemary Oil. Rosmarinus Officinalis Flower Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves and fresh flowering tops of the Rosemary, Rosmarinus officinalis L., Lamiaceae
Helichrysum Stoechas Flower Oil is an essential oil distilled from the flowers of the Eternal Flower, Helichrysum stoechas, Asteraceae
Cognac oil. Distilled from the residues of wine production. Syn. Lie di Vin oil
Trigonella Foenum-Graecum Seed Oil is an essential oil obtained from the seeds of the Fenugreek, Trigonella foenum-graecum L., Leguminosae

Citronella Oil (Sri Lanka). Cymbopogon Nardus Herb Oil is an essential oil obtained from the herbs of the plant, Cymbopogon (syn: Andropogon) nardus (L.), Gramineae. The Ceylon citronella oil contains geraniol (about 60%), citronellal (about 15%), camphene, limonene, linalool, borneol. The Java citronella oil contains 25-50% citronellal, 25-45% geraniol
Citrus Nobilis Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the Mandarin, Citrus nobilis, Rutaceae. Mandarin petitgrain oil contains methyl N methyl anthranilate
Citrus Aurantium Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the Sour Orange, Citrus aurantium, Rutaceae
Ormenis Multicaulis Flower Oil is an essential oil obtained from the flowers of the Moroccan Chamomile, Ormenis multicaulis, Compositae

Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Oil is the essential oil steam-distilled from the dried fruits of the Fennel, Foeniculum vulgare, Miller spp. Capillaceum (Gillib) Holmboe var. vulgare Miller, Umbelliferae. Syn. Bitter fennel. It contains anethole (50-60%), fenchone (about 10%), pinene, limonene and phellandrene
Cyperus Scariosus Root Oil is an essential oil obtained from the rhizomes of the plant, Cyperus scariosus, Cyperaceae
Myrrh Oil; Heerabol. Commiphora Abyssinica Gum Oil is an essential oil obtained from the gum-resin of the Yemen Myrrh, Commiphora abyssinica, Burseraceae

IDENTIFIER: name: CITRUS SINENSIS VALENCIA PEEL OIL EXPRESSED
PROPERTY: Description: Citrus Sinensis Valencia Peel oil Expressed is an essential oil expressed from the epicarps of the Sweet Orange Valencia, Citrus sinensis, Rutaceae

Spike Oil. Lavandula Spica Herb Oil is an essential oil distilled from the flowering herbs of the Spikenard, Lavandula spica (syn: Lavandula latifolia), Labiatae. It contains eucalyptol (35%), camphor, linalool, borneol, terpineol, D-camphene and sesquiterpenes
Thymus Serpillum Oil is an essential oil obtained from the herbs of the Wild Thyme, Thymus serpillum L., Lamiaceae

IDENTIFIER: name: PINUS MUGO PUMILIO TWIG LEAF OIL
PROPERTY: Description: Dwarf Pine Needles Oil; Pinus Pumilio Oil. Pinus Mugo Pumilio Twig Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the twigs leaves of the Mountain Pine, Pinus mugo var. pumilio, (syn. P. turra; syn. Montana Miller), Pinaceae

Eucalyptus Smithii Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the fresh leaves of the Eucalyptus, Eucalyptus smithii, Myrtaceae. Its chief constituent is eucalyptol (70-80%) accompanied by alpha-pinene, phellandrene, terpineol, citronellal, geranyl acetate, eudesmol, eudesmyl acetate, piperitone, isovaleral and other volatile aldehydes
Lavandula Intermedia Flower/Leaf/Stem Oil is the volatile oil obtained from the flowers, leaves and stems of the Lavender, Lavandula intermedia, Labiatae
Ravensara Aromatica Twig Oil is an essential oil obtained from the twigs fruit of the plant, Ravensara aromatica, Lauraceae
Cinnamomum Camphora Linalooliferum Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the Camphor Tree, Cinnamomum camphora (L.) var. linalooliferum, Lauraceae. Syn. Ho leaf oil
Thujopsis Dolabrata Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the Thujopsis dolabrata, Cupressaceae

IDENTIFIER: name: CITRUS MEDICA ACIDA PEEL OIL EXPRESSED
PROPERTY: Description: Citrus Medica Acida Peel Oil Expressed is an essential oil expressed from the epicarps of the Citrus, Citrus medica L. var. acida, Rutaceae

IDENTIFIER: name: CITRUS PARADISI M. PEEL OIL EXPRESSED
PROPERTY: Description: Grapefruit Oil Expressed; Shaddock Oil Expressed. Citrus Paradisi M. Peel Oil is an essential oil expressed from the epicarps of the Grapefruit, Citrus paradisi M., Rutaceae
Thuja Plicata Leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the Thuja, Thuja plicata, Cupressaceae
Myrrh Oil; Heerabol. Commiphora Schimperi Gum oil is an essential oil obtained from the gum-resin of the myrrh, Commiphora schimperi, Burseraceae
Anethym Sowa Seed Oil is the essential oil obtained from the herbs and seeds of the dill, Anethum sowa, Apiaceae
Eucalyptus Species Leaf Oil is an essential oil distilled from the fresh leaves of different species of Eucalyptus, Eucalyptus spp., Myrtaceae
Levisticum Officinale leaf Oil is an essential oil obtained from the leaves of the Lovage, Levisticum officinale, Apiaceae
Verbena Officinalis Leaf Rectified Oil is a rectified essential oil obtained from the leaves of the plant Verbena officinalis L., Verbenaceae
Thuja Occidentalis Stem Oil is an essential oil obtained from the stems of the Thuja, Thuja occidentalis L., Cupressacea
Opoponax Oil. Commiphora Erythrea Glabrescens Gum Oil is an essential oil distilled from the gum exudate of the Commiphora erythrea var. glabrescens, Burseraceae
Arnica Montana Flower Oil is an essential oil obtained from distillation of the flowers of arnica, Arnica montana L., Asteraceae
Opopanax Chironium Resin Steam-distilled Oil is the steam destillated oil obtained from the resin of the plant, Opopanax chironium (L.), Apiaceae

Foeniculum Vulgare Vulgare Fruit oil is the essential oil steam-distilled from the dried fruits of the Fennel, Foeniculum vulgare vulgare, Umbelliferae. It contains anethole (50-60%), fenchone (about 10%), pinene, limonene and phellandrene
Salvia Officinalis Lavandulifolia Herb Oil is an essential oil obtained from the herbs of the Sage, Salvia officinalis L. spp. lavandulifolia, Lamiaceae, Syn. Dalmatian sage
Melilotus Officinalis Herb Oil is an essential oil distilled from the herbs of the Sweet Clover, Melilotus officinalis, Leguminosae
